mechanics.outcome: Create a 10-foot-radius immobile dome of force around and above the caster, remaining stationary for the duration

mechanics.condition: Dome's area includes a creature larger than Medium OR more than nine creatures
Creature or object was within the dome's area when the spell was cast
mechanics.outcome: Creature or object can move through the dome freely

mechanics.condition: Creature or object was NOT within the dome's area when the spell was cast
mechanics.outcome: Creature or object is barred from passing through the dome

mechanics.trigger: Spell or magical effect attempts to cross dome boundary
mechanics.condition: Spell or magical effect originates outside the dome OR attempts to target through the dome
mechanics.outcome: Spell or magical effect cannot extend through the dome or be cast through it

mechanics.condition: Weather outside the dome is uncomfortable or extreme
mechanics.outcome: Atmosphere inside the dome is comfortable and dry
The interior of the dome becomes dimly lit OR dark (caster's choice)
The dome appears opaque, of any color chosen by the caster
The dome appears transparent from the inside

description_text: A 10-foot-radius immobile dome of force springs into existence around and above you and remains stationary for the duration. The spell ends if you leave its area. Nine creatures of Medium size or smaller can fit inside the dome with you. The spell fails if its area includes a larger creature or more than nine creatures. Creatures and objects within the dome when you cast this spell can move through it freely. All other creatures and objects are barred from passing through it. Spells and other magical effects can't extend through the dome or be cast through it. The atmosphere inside the space is comfortable and dry, regardless of the weather outside. Until the spell ends, you can command the interior to become dimly lit or dark. The dome is opaque from the outside, of any color you choose, but it is transparent from the inside.
